# Change Log

This library uses [Compatible Versioning](https://github.com/staltz/comver#readme).

## [Unreleased]

## [v1.4]
### Fixed
- Contribution calculations for 3D and 4D.

## [v1.0]
### Added
- Define `noise2D`, `noise3D`, and `noise4D` functions.
